homeDescription.subtitle: Front-end Software Egineer
homeDescription.description: Welcome to my digital corner! I've built this portfolio with lots of love and code, using Vue 3, Typescript, and Pinia for efficient state management. Here, I have fun experimenting with the latest trends in frontend development and bringing my most innovative ideas to life.

descriptions.paragraph1: I'm a Colombian with a Spanish soul, or perhaps a Spaniard with a Colombian heart. I've been fortunate to live in both countries and soak up the best of each culture: the joy, work ethic, problem-solving skills, love for family, and perseverance.
descriptions.paragraph2: Ever since I was a kid, I've been drawn to technology. I started with Habbo servers and custom Android operating systems, and now, here I am, living my passion every day. But life isn't all about code; I also love staying fit with crossfit, getting lost in nature, traveling to discover new horizons, enjoying good music, and constantly learning in all areas of life.
